name: Desecration of Wings
description: The Endless Court is eternal, ruled by Immortals who have guided the four races of the world since the dawn of time. But they seem very concerned with preventing anyone from studying the broken ruins that litter the world, and peace is more fragile than it seems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Pentium III 500mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
